well, it didn't take long to return to a more classical hand positioning 
for touch typing (versus the flattened fingering I was experimenting 
with). With that, I have returned to the original [Colemak 
Shift-DH][colemak shift-dh] layout after playing with the [Shift-mod 
**CV**][shift-mod layout] keymap swap -- that it didn't appear to impact 
typing negatively was expected but finger memory of some bigrams is much 
happier with the return..
